original_title: King Crimson: Meltdown - Live In Mexico City
overview: Live performance during the King Crimson's five nights residency at Teatro Metropolitan, Mexico City in July 2017.  Robert Fripp: Guitar & keyboards  Mel Collins: Saxes & flute  Gavin Harrison: Drums,  Jakko Jakszyk: Guitar & voice  Tony Levin: Basses & stick  Pat Mastelotto: Drums,  Bill Rieflin: Keyboards  Jeremy Stacey: Drums & keyboards
title: King Crimson: Meltdown - Live In Mexico City
